p: To perform this intervention, two forms of space sprays are commonly used for control: thermal fog and cold fog, also known as ultralow volume (ULV) sprays. Both can be distributed using a vehicle-mounted or hand-held machine [ 78]. The insecticide concentration ranges from 2% (pyrethroids) to 95% (organophosphates), depending on the amount of active ingredient in the formulation. The applied volume is dependent on the compound concentration and toxicity to the target species [ 80]. Aerial spraying of pyrethrin significantly impacts small organisms found in the sprayed zones, which is not the case on large bodies [ 81].
